pullRequest.title: [WFLY-14156]: Remove MicroProfile REST Client from Wildfly ee.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Making rest-client api optionnal in resteasy-cdi and removing it from the Jaxrs subsystem

nodes.bodyText: Is this needed? The next execution should copy over this fine with the one from the local src/main/resources.

@jfdenise My instinct is if we override a layer from a depended-upon FP, instead of letting Galleon combine the layer bits we are better off completely redeclaring the layer, as is done at df965e9#diff-2fa73c0a47166ab82aea627f723525fbb1b3d1a112e07cfa018fc33bc08ddb23R7
There's some places where completely overriding is needed because the layer-spec.xml from the 'lower' FP doesn't actually get used. And it seems better to consistently do it the same way.
Doing that would also remove the need for df965e9#diff-2fa73c0a47166ab82aea627f723525fbb1b3d1a112e07cfa018fc33bc08ddb23
It's not a big deal though; should not block merging this.

commit.message:
[WFLY-14148]: Move microprofile opentracing from wildfly-ee to wildfly.

* removing opentracing from the ee feature pack and moving it to the complete feature pack.
* fixing the test suite to take into account both kind of configuration
  (layers vs full).
* removing the need for commons-lang3 in some tests.
* ignoring OnOffOpenTracingTestCase as it should require a restart and not just a reload of the server.

Jira: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFLY-14148
